name: ORD_NLP_INITIAL_LNK_RES
description: This table contains information about links between findings and general recommendations that were extracted from radiology reports by a natural language processing model.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the finding record associated with this link.

columns.name: RECOMMENDATION_FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the recommendation finding record associated with this link.
